description: Internal education platform for @fyves.com members - Vibe Coding Academy

userStories.title: Create database schema for Cursos
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the database tables to store courses, sections, and user progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate and run Supabase migration successfully
userStories.notes: Database schema created successfully. Migration file exists but needs manual application due to IPv6 connectivity issues.

userStories.title: Implement @fyves.com access control middleware
userStories.description: As a security requirement, only @fyves.com organization members can access /cursos routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Redirect to /dashboard with error message if unauthorized
userStories.notes: @fyves.com access control middleware implemented. Checks workspace website and user email domain. Logs unauthorized attempts. Redirects to dashboard with error message.

userStories.title: Create /cursos page route and course listing
userStories.description: As a Fyves member, I want to see available courses when I navigate to the Cursos section.
acceptanceCriteria: Grid layout showing course cards with title, duration, progress
Framer Motion entrance animations on cards
Empty state when no courses exist
userStories.notes: Created /organizations/[id]/cursos page with course grid layout, Framer Motion animations, empty state, responsive design. Typecheck passes.

userStories.title: Build course player with section navigation
userStories.description: As a learner, I need a player interface to navigate through course sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Sections marked as completed on navigation
userStories.notes: Built course player with section navigation, Remotion Player for video, Markdown rendering, auto-save every 30s, resume where left off functionality.

userStories.title: Implement interactive checkpoints
userStories.description: As a learner, I need to complete knowledge checkpoints before advancing.
acceptanceCriteria: Immediate feedback: Correct or 'Review section X'
userStories.notes: P1 feature - can defer to post-MVP

userStories.title: Create certification system and badge
userStories.description: As a learner who completed the course, I want to receive a Vibe Coder certification badge.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge 'Fyves Vibe Coder - Nivel 1' on user profile

userStories.title: Add Framer Motion micro-interactions
userStories.description: As a user, I want smooth, calm animations that convey confidence without dopamine noise.
acceptanceCriteria: Elegant hover states on course cards

userStories.title: Create admin analytics dashboard
userStories.description: As an org admin, I want to see team progress and completion metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: List of members with course status

userStories.title: Generate flagship course content (Spanish)
userStories.description: As a learner, I need the complete 8-module course content in Spanish.
acceptanceCriteria: All content in Spanish, 4 hours total
userStories.notes: Generated 9-module course content in Spanish: Modulo 0 (Orientacion), 1 (Vibe Shift), 2 (AI Stack), 3 (Prompts), 4 (Multi-Agent), 5 (Infrastructure), 6 (IDEs), 7 (Production), 8 (Certificacion). Course ready to insert after migration.
